summary: SummaryMario Badescuâ€™s Seaweed Cleansing Lotion will Re-balance skin post-cleanse with Mario Badescu's mineral-rich Witch Hazel tone. This cleansing lotion will tighten pores and clarify the skinâ€™s complexion.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsClarifying Witch HazelMineral-rich Bladderwrack (Seaweed) ExtractSoothing and hydrating Aloe VeraItem 2209938How To UseTwice daily after cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton ball or pad. Wipe in sweeping, outward motions until the cotton comes up clean. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Propylene Glycol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Parfum (Fragrance), Caprylyl Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 42090 (Blue 1), Benzoic Acid, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool, Amyl Cinnamal, Hexyl Cinnamal.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Twice daily after cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton ball or pad. Wipe in sweeping, outward motions until the cotton comes up clean. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

reviews.headline: Love this toner
reviews.comments: I have been using this toner for a very long time, years. It just works for me. I have ouly skin, that use to have acne from time to time a d this helpe remove my make up it doesnt break my face out or burn. It is just something i cant do without honestly.

reviews.headline: Seaweed toner
reviews.comments: I have been using this toner on my face for a very long time. I have oily, sensitive skin that has blemishes at times. This stuff i love and live for. Its very delicate on my face no burning. It does remove my access make up. It just works for me and its not expensive. I cant go without it. Waiting for it to come in the mail now. It last long about 2 months.

reviews.headline: Smells like used cat litter
reviews.comments: It feels great on my skin and I think it works really well but won't buy again cuz of the odor. It smells like my cats used litter box but it does work great.

reviews.headline: love this  spritz
reviews.comments: After cleansing, I spritz. Love the feeling.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: This is a great cleansing lotion if you just want to wipe down your face instead of washing it. It's smells so good and fresh and helps maintain my acne. It's not an absolute miracle for all my skin problems but it helps a lot ! I use this in the morning instead of washing my whole face and then continue with the rest of my skin care. It doesn't dry out your face (combination skin over here) and it doesn't make it oily. It leaves you fresh and feeling clean. Would definitely recommend giving it a try !

reviews.headline: Amazing results
reviews.comments:
I wanted a toner that would help with uneven skin tone, and help minimize the pores on and around my nose. I have combination skin, and occasionally have small breakouts on my jawline. After several uses, I noticed a huge difference! This product really works! It helps minimizes the small breakouts I get, clears the oils from around my nose and shrunk my problematic pores. And the price for the size of the product, is a steal!
All positive comments aside, the smell, is awful. It smells like an old ladies perfume. It does linger, but luckily not for too long.  Even though the smell isn't my cup of tea, I will continue to use this product because it works so well.

reviews.headline: My favorite toner!
reviews.comments: Using this with the Enzyme Cleansing Gel is my holy grail!

reviews.headline: Loovvveee
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this toner.  It's very light and makes my skin feel so refreshed.  I love the smell.  I have SUPER sensitive skin and it feels so amazing.  Highly recommend!!!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product over and over again.
reviews.comments: I've used Mario Badescu for a decent amount of time and have loved using their products. It's helped my skin out so much!

reviews.headline: My favorite skin product--if you shave your face it's a MUST
reviews.comments:
This is the one skincare product I simply can't live without. I have been using it for years and it blows every other toner out of the water hands downâ€“even the ones that cost as much as 3 times the price. I have combination-oily skin that is prone to breakouts as well as extremely sensitive. I also shave my face every single morning, which can do a lot of harm and create redness, welts, and abrasions. This product takes care of all of that. It soothes and relieves my skin and visibly decreases the redness. It clears up my pores and strips dirt from my skin. It leaves me feeling fresh every time. I never leave home without it. I use it in the AM after a morning cleanserâ€“applying evenly to the face and wiping off with a cotton pad (wipe strategically and away from the face to prevent dirt buildups) and follow it with a mattifying SPF moisturizer. I LOVE this brand and I LOVE this product. 

If you are someone who shaves your face, or someone with sensitive and acne-prone skin, I can't recommend this product highly enough.

reviews.headline: Amazing Toner!
reviews.comments: This stuff works great! The name is confusing but it's just a toner. Nice clean, fresh smell and I notice my skin is much brighter, tighter and better after using. Definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: lovin it
reviews.comments: on my third bottle ... keep coming back to this one after trying another brands

reviews.headline: Essential 2nd step
reviews.comments: I use this lotion / toner after the seaweed soap and have noticed a definite improvement in the clarity of my skin and it definitely feels less dry before I put moisturizer on than soap alone.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: Mario Badescu got this product right. It helps balance oil while toning and does not feel harsh like other toners. I will buy this again and again.

reviews.headline: Fantastic!
reviews.comments: My new go to! This toner is quite glorious. Huge change in my skin. Blemishes disappear so much faster with my daily use of this product after cleansing my face. Love this stuff!

reviews.headline: My skin feels hydrated
reviews.comments: My skin feels less dry. I use this after cleansing, before putting on serum and then moisturizer.

reviews.headline: I think it's worth it!
reviews.comments:
I knew I needed a toner in my daily skincare routine, so I set out to research the best toners for combo-type skin. Came across the Seaweed Cleansing Lotion and decided to give it a shot. Yes, this product is a toner! I know the name can be a bit deceiving. 
When trying out this product, I have to say I did break out a bit, especially on my forehead. My skin was not used to this product in the beginning and I should have tested it out in a small area before committing to use it all over my face. I waited a few weeks before trying it out again and it actually paired with my skin very well! A little goes a long way for me and I did notice the extra dirt and make-up residue my cotton ball grabs when sweeping off the toner across my face. My face feels refreshed after use! Overall, I would buy this product again.

reviews.headline: Very refreshing and smells so good
reviews.comments: Inuse it after cleansing and before moisturizer

reviews.headline: Works so good on oily skin
reviews.comments: On the mb website it says good for dry and combo skin but i have oily skin and it works sooooo well my skin has been glowing ever since i got this

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I bought this for the witch hazel component and it works very well to tone oily skin.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Affordable, size will go a long way

display_values: Affordable, size will go a long way

faceoff_positive.comments: This is so perfect for my skin. I have VERY DRY and VERY ACNE PRONE skin and it's a disaster most of the time. Other acne products dry my skin out completely to the point of flaking and cracking. This does not. Usually, products meant to keep moisture in your skin end up giving me clogged pores and horrible breakouts. This does not. It is non-drying and non-pore clogging. I love it. I notice it doesn't exactly FIGHT acne but it doesn't CAUSE it like other products. And it doesn't dry my skin out. I use this with the MB seaweed night cream AND MY SKIN IS SO NICE. My skin is not dry at all, and not full of product-induced acne. I do however get hormonal acne and this DOES NOT MAKE IT WORSE like many other products. Keeps it under control. I recommend this to anybody with dry acne prone skin
faceoff_positive.headline: Excellent for dry acne prone skin

faceoff_negative.comments: I had purchased this because I was getting annoyed with overbearing alcohol of Formula 10.0.06 ive loved that product it cleaned my skin so well . Ive been using this seaweed cleanser almost two weeks now, YES ive noticed a difference when i apply my  moisturizer YES i see a difference in the texture of my skin . However Ive been breaking out and experienced  CLOGGED PORES MORE THAN IVE HAD BEFORE- more whiteheads too. Im really not sure if I want to keep this product or not .
faceoff_negative.headline: Mixed feelings
